name: New Zealand Research Information System (NZRIS) Data Specifications Output Identifier Type
maintainer: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment

Definition: A unique numeric commercial book identifier, issued prior to 2007
A unique numeric commercial book identifier, issued from 2007 onwards
A unique alphanumeric string assigned to identify content and provide a persistent link to its location on the internet
An address to the location of the output on the internet
A serial number used to uniquely identify a serial print publication
A serial number used to uniquely identify a serial electronic publication
A unique identifier used by some scientific journals to identify documents
